metadata.title: CVE-2016-10189 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: BitlBee before 3.5 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service(NULL pointer dereference and crash) and possibly execute arbitrary codevia a file transfer request for a contact that is not in the contact list.

criterions.comment: bitlbee: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
